publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6928 Stewart Maxwell: East Renfrewshire Food Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the second East Renfrewshire Food Festival, which is scheduled to run from 11 to 18 September 2010 alongside Scottish Food Fortnight; notes that the festival, organised by East Renfrewshire Council in conjunction with EventScotland, will focus on healthy eating and offer a programme of events to celebrate local Scottish produce as well as ethnic cuisine; further notes that the seven-day showcase will include a local farmers’ market in Clarkston, an evening of whisky tasting at Eastwood Park Theatre and a visit from the Focus on Food Cooking Bus, which will offer children and parents advice and interactive cooking lessons, and encourages people from the west of Scotland and beyond not to miss out on what promises to be a fantastic celebration of Scottish food and drink. Supported by: Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Ken Macintosh*, Jackson Carlaw*, Bill Kidd*
S3M-6928 East Renfrewshire Food Festival (lodged on 7 September 2010) Jamie Hepburn*, Elaine Smith*, Kenneth Gibson*, Maureen Watt*, Aileen Campbell*, Jim Tolson*
